unit_identifier.description: for convenience, referenced item's primary inventory unit

secondary_unit_identifier.description: for convenience, referenced item's secondary inventory unit if defined

estimated_qty.description: if present, calculated from SecondaryQty and cannot confirm until Qty entered

estimated_secondary_qty.description: if present, calculated from Qty and cannot confirm until SecondaryQty entered

original_primary_qty.description: on a shorted order, specifies original quantity ordered; otherwise same as Qty

is_order_qty_secondary.description: if both Qty and SecondaryQty present, indicates whether at some point prior to shipping only SecondaryQty was present

allocations.description: supplied on GET {get;set;} ignored on PUT, POST

bin.description: supplied on GET, ignored on PUT, POST; use pick operations to set; cleared when shipped or packaged
